RefParameter.Description: Values from digital filter or from channel watchdog filter.

RefParameter.Name: HighThreshold
RefParameter.Description: High threshold for the analog watchdog.

RefParameter.Description: Low threshold for the analog watchdog.

RefParameter.Name: HighBreakSignal
RefParameter.Description: Break signal assigned to analog watchdog high threshold event.

RefParameter.Description: Break signal assigned to analog watchdog low threshold event.

RefParameter.Description: Rising, falling or both edges selected

RefParameter.Name: InjectedChannelsNbr
RefParameter.Description: Number of channels in injected sequence
